Package problem1

Class Vehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • problem1.Vehicle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Car, Luxury, Truck, Van
    public class Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Vehicle stores information about vehicle - daily price and number of booked days

    • Constructor Detail

      • Vehicle

        public Vehicle​(java.lang.Double dailyPrice,
               java.lang.Integer bookedDays)
        throws DailyPriceNumericException,
               BookedDaysNumericException
        Constructor for the class Vehicle
        Parameters:
        dailyPrice - - the cost of a single day rental, encoded as Double
        bookedDays - - the number of days the vehicle has been rented out to a client, encoded as Integer
        Throws:
        DailyPriceNumericException - On non-positive dailyPrice
        BookedDaysNumericException - On negative bookedDays

    • Method Detail

      • getDailyPrice

        public java.lang.Double getDailyPrice()
        Getter for daily price
        Returns:
        - the cost of a single day rental, as a Double

      • getBookedDays

        public java.lang.Integer getBookedDays()
        Getter for booked days
        Returns:
        - the number of days the vehicle has been rented out to a client, as an Integer

      • setBookedDays

        public void setBookedDays​(java.lang.Integer bookedDays)
                   throws BookedDaysNumericException
        Setter for booked days
        Parameters:
        bookedDays - - the number of days the vehicle has been rented out to a client, as an Integer
        Throws:
        BookedDaysNumericException - On negative bookedDays

      • isAvailable

        public java.lang.Boolean isAvailable()
        Check if the vehicle is available or not, the vehicle is considered available if the number of booked days is 0
        Returns:
        - if the vehicle is available or not, as a Boolean
